lines.text: If I can con him in closer as he reaches for the glass I can grab for him.
He'd yank you, then both of you'd go over.
Not if somebody hung on to me.
He'd yank us all. I don't mind losing you, but I don't want a whole daisy chain of cops sailing out that window.
Operator!
Good morning.
This is the waiter in 1505.
I'll connect you with room service.
No, no!
I don't want a waiter, I am a waiter!
Everybody lies to me!
You should have ten good reasons for anything. That's a rule!
Look, I almost had him a couple of times. I - I know I can con him in if I can just get my hands on what's bothering him.

[Discussing suicide]
Yeah, that's a crime, ain't it, knockin' yourself off? They could throw ya in jail, couldn't they?

[about the jumper]
Yeah, if I had my M-2, I could knock him off from here - clean!

[Inquiring about Cosick's hysterical mother]
What goes with her anyway?

[Disgusted]
She's a case, just like the boy!
Life stinks and you know it.

[Phoning to police headquarters]
Dunnigan, Traffic "A."
There's a jumper on the ledge... Hotel Rodney!
If those cops come near me... I'll jump!
Stay away from me... or I'll jump!
